location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are file notes at the end, on folios 7-8. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file. Most of the documents listed in the notes, dated from 5 January 1946 to 12 July 1948, have been removed from the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence from Arabian American Oil Company (ARAMCO) representatives regarding Indian nationals returning to India from Saudi Arabia or Bahrain. There is also a request from the Political Agent at Bahrain to the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain to keep under surveillance a man from Aden, suspect of having made communist speeches in Dhahran.
